I like to go swimming in the summer

Swimming is my most favorite activity in the summer. When the sun is shinning and the air is warm, you will find me dipping into my backyard pool. It's not an impressive pool, onlly threee feet deep, but it's mine

There are three reasons I like to swim:
  • I get lots of exercise.
  • I enjoy the freedom
  • I have an opprotunity to be in the sun
